revision.revremark: Initial version for Piko LC2 with SmartDecoder XP5.1

label.text: Setting that determines which bank 0 - 9 is programmed. Reset to "Bank 0" when done!
Auswahl der zu programmierenden Bank 0 - 9: (Zurückstellen nach "Bank 0" wenn fertig!)
Nastavení programování banky 0 - 9. Po dokončení obnovte na Banka 0!
Output #7 (Red Class Lights : auto sequencer) - Conditions:
Output #8 (White Class Lights : auto sequencer) - Conditions:
Output #9 (Green Class Lights : auto sequencer) - Conditions:
Output #16 (Loco ID Boards : auto sequencer) - Conditions:
Time steps for fading the outputs in and out (0 - 15)
Zeitstufen zum Ein- und Ausblenden der Ausgänge (0 - 15)
